questions_map.label:
Do you outsource some of your data processing1?

[1] A processing of personal data is an operation, or set of operations, relating to personal data, regardless of the process used. The GDPR names a whole series of different types of processing such as collecting, recording, modifying, disseminating or otherwise making available, or erasing and destroying (e.g. salary processing, candidate processing, client lists, prospect client lists).

Note : Paper files may also be concerned (if they are structured, for example by an alphabetical or chronological classification).
